```{r init,echo=FALSE}
cat('\014')
rm(list=ls())
source('source.R')

#local defaults
knitr::opts_chunk$set(eval=TRUE,fig.path='figs') # set eval=FALSE to render only markdown.
```

#Install
```{r,eval=F}
# for topic model
install.packages(c('stm','SnowballC'))

# for visualization https://github.com/cpsievert/LDAvis
install.packages(c('devtools','network','shiny','LDAvis','servr'))
```


#Import

```{r import}
load("107th Congressional Record (ICPSR).RData")
icpsr2stmbow<-icpsr2stmbow.f(icpsr.cong107,sample.size=20)
str(icpsr2stmbow)
```


#Model

```{r model}
stmbow2lda<-stmbow2lda.f(
	stmbow=icpsr2stmbow
	,out.dir='output'
	,k=5
	,alpha=NULL
	,visualize.results=T
	,verbose=T
)
```


#Visualize

```{r visualize}
lda2viz<-lda2viz.f(stmbow2lda)
```
